definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The speaker declaimed against the government's new law.
sentences.chinese: 演說者攻擊政府頒佈的新法令。

sentences.english: When it comes to public speaking, there are three major avenues you can take to make good money.
sentences.chinese: 在演說者方面，有三種方法可以使你掙得盆滿鉢滿。

sentences.english: The speaker incited the mob to demonstrate against the rising cost of living.
sentences.chinese: 演說者鼓動羣衆示威遊行，抗議生活費高漲。

sentences.english: The orator dwelt on that point for nearly twenty minutes.
sentences.chinese: 演說者對那一點詳細論述了將近二十分鐘。

sentences.english: The crowd hooted at the speaker.
Listento the speaker and record what he says.
sentences.chinese: 聽演說者講，把他的話錄下來。

sentences.english: The sonorous voice of the speaker echoed round the hall.
sentences.chinese: 演說者洪亮的聲音在大廳內迴盪。

sentences.english: The speaker's opinion discords with ours.
sentences.chinese: 演說者的見解和我們的不一致。

sentences.english: The angry crowd howled the speaker off the platform.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒的人羣把演說者趕下了臺。

sentences.english: The pompous lecturer is strutting ago or toth over the stage.
sentences.chinese: 這個演說者在臺上趾高氣揚地來回走着。

sentences.english: The speaker was groaned down by his audience.
sentences.chinese: 那演說者被聽衆轟下了臺。

sentences.english: Your applause would react on the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 你們的喝采封演說者有影響。

sentences.english: A BMS work hard to create a team that's united.
sentences.chinese: 事業促進演說者在努力建立一個聯合的團隊。

sentences.english: A bigot is a stone-deaf orator.
sentences.chinese: 執拗的人是全聾的演說者。

sentences.english: At his best, Mr Kennedy was a fine orator.
sentences.chinese: 在他最佳的時候，肯尼迪先生是一個很好的演說者。
演說者停下來喘一口氣。
